title: Continuing JS Algorithm Masterclass
description: Learning a frequency counter pattern that does not use nested loops to keep it a O(n) instead of O(n^2). Learning about using multiple pointers in loops to compare and sort iterables.
tools: big o, time complexity, space complexity, algorithms, logarithms

title: Beginning: JavaScript and Data Structures Masterclass
description: Learning about how Big O can help compare algorithms. Learning about counting operations. Learning the difference between O(1), O(n) and O(n^2). Learned hot to simplify big O expressions. Learning the difference between time complexity and space complexity. Insertion, removal, and access of Objects are all O(1).  Searching is O(n).  Array Insertion and Removal is is O(1) if done at the end and O(n) if done at the front. Searching is O(n) and Access is O(1). Very interestingüßê!  Learning steps for a problem solving approach including Understanding the Problem, Exploring Examples, Breaking it Down, Solving and Simplifying, and Refactoring.
tools: big o, time complexity, space complexity, algorithms, logarithms

title: MongoDB new Stephen Grider Project
description: Added the updateMany query to artists being retired or not retired.  Finished the UpStarMusic project. Finished the project! Started the next and final project of the course.  Making a backend for a Uber rippoff using Express, Mongoose, MongoDB and testing with Mocha and Supertest. Added controllers and routers. Downloaded the Postman App (previously used Insomnia) and checked the PUT request. Added a second database just for testing. Added error handling middleware for the create route. Added update route and tested it.  Added a PointSchema subfdocument for geolocation. Added query for drivers around a certain point geographically.  The final function of the course (geoNear) was deprecated so the final test didn't work... womp womp.  I could figure it out later but  I FINISHED THE COURSE!
tools: mongodb, mongoose, mocha, javascript, node, sort, crud, limit, skip, geojson, middleware, subdocument, postman
